meanings.definition: Causing or accelerating a reaction by its own products.
meanings.sent1: The autocatalytic process speeds up on its own.
meanings.sent2: The autocatalytic reaction increases in speed as it progresses.
meanings.sent3: The autocatalytic mixture seemed to be in a hurry to react with itself.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was autocatalytic, spreading quickly to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The autocatalytic nature of the fire made it impossible to contain.

meanings.definition: Involving a reaction that catalyzes itself.
meanings.sent1: The autocatalytic system continued to catalyze without external help.
meanings.sent2: An autocatalytic process can sustain itself without additional catalysts.
meanings.sent3: The autocatalytic experiment felt like a self-sufficient little chemist.
meanings.sent4: His leadership style was autocatalytic, inspiring others to take charge.
meanings.sent5: The autocatalytic cycle seemed to have a life of its own.
